data.name: IBM
data.title: Technology Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Contributed to the full-stack development of multiple projects for in a cross-functional Agile software development team
Implemented multiple features using ReactJS for various client products with IBM CDS
Built RESTful APIs using Spring Boot that served data to the frontend of the products

data.name: GIC
data.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
responsibilities: Contributed to the full-stack development of a live-service internal platform used by Portfolio Managers to track the performance of securities and access research notes from different teams
Utilized Redux and RTK Query to manage the store of the application to reduce the number of API calls to the backend and improved property management for various components
Improved the development and deployment build time of a React application by 40% using SWC
Developed and designed the Administration Page of a live-service internal platform

data.name: Kinexcs
data.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
responsibilities: Managed backend services using AWS involving the development of RESTful APIs running on EC2 instances using Python Flask and maintained databases on RDS and DynamoDB
Standardized the Software Development Life Cycle of a mobile application
Migrated a Flutter based mobile application to null safety
Streamlined the data transfer process from a Bluetooth device to RDS while ensuring data-integrity
